com.google.enterprise.connector.spi
Interface AuthenticationManager

public interface AuthenticationManager

Authentication Manager. All calls for end-user query authentication pass through this interface.

Method Summary
 boolean authenticate(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
          Authenticates against the repository and returns true or false depending on whether authentication was successful.
 

Method Detail

authenticate

public boolean authenticate(java.lang.String username,
                            java.lang.String password)
                     throws LoginException,
                            RepositoryException
Authenticates against the repository and returns true or false depending on whether authentication was successful. If an exception is thrown, the implementor should provide an explanatory message.

Parameters:
username - A String, the user's name
password - A String, the user's password
Returns:
True means that authentication succeeded, false indicates failure
Throws:
LoginException - if there is a credentials-related problem that prohibits authentication
RepositoryException - if there is a more general problem, such as the system is unreachable or down
